modName: Dawnguard Glowing Vampire Eye Fix - All Races
summary: This mod adds Dawnguard-style glowing vampire eyes for Orcs, Argonians, and Khajiit. Also, it fixes the eyes for humanoid females and Breton vampire children(Babette).
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Dawnguard-style glowing vampire eyes for Orcs, Argonians, and Khajiit. Also, it fixes the eyes for humanoid females and Breton vampire children(Babette). 

Requirements: Dawnguard DLC

Compatibility: 

This mod will not be compatible with any mods that alter humanoid(imperial, breton, nord, redguard) race . 

 

Also, not compatible with mods that have Babette\'s facegendata(0001D4B7.NIF)

COMPATIBLE WITH VAMPIRE EYE RETEXTURES

Installation
Recommend to install it with the mod manager

it is available steam work shop
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93008405

Troubleshooting
Sometimes it would make Babetteâ€™s face black. But this bug has happened to every mod that using a facegen files. It will be fixed when you reboot the game.

about quest \"the gift\"
this mod will not fix your spouse\'s eyes, because they don\'t become a actual vampire race inside game.      

Known bugs
there is reports that the mod take off the face vein and red lips red stripes of the lips. and I don\'t have Idea yet . I will try to figure it out
author: Ryeong
